data.title: Rachel Portman Biography (1960-)
data.text:
Theatre, Film, and Television Biographies

Brock Peters to Jonathan Prince

Rachel Portman Biography (1960-)

Full name, Rachel Mary Berkeley Portman; born December 11, 1960, in Haslemere, England; daughter of Berkeley Charles and Penelope (maiden name, Mowat) Portman; married Count Uberto Pasolini Dall'Onda (a producer), February 25, 1995; children: Anna Gwendolen, Giulia Ginevra, Niky Joan. Addresses: Agent: Kraft-Engel Management, 15233 Ventura Blvd., Suite 200, Sherman Oaks, CA 91403.

Nationality

British

Gender

Female

Occupation

Composer, orchestrator

Birth Details

December 11, 1960

Haslemere, United Kingdom
